fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A centre-spread photograph of Rannoch Moor in the Scottish Highlands showed an icy Lochan na h’Achlaise, not Loch Bà as given in the caption supplied to us (Eyewitness, 21 November, page 30). • In a story headed First-time nominees sweep top Grammy categories (21 November, page 12) the Lewis Capaldi ballad competing for song of the year should have been given as Someone You Loved, not Someone Like You. • Other recently corrected articles include: Last Christmas may be the worst film of the year – so why is it box-office gold? And they’re off … £6.8bn Christmas ad spree gets under way
